items.reviewContent:
Just work for 15 seconds after which it stops working. Highly disappointed about quality control.
Be aware of Thier fooling 14 days policy they told me to go service center on your own. totally pathetic service by daraz and Dawlance.
items.itemTitle: Dawlance Men's Grooming with Accessories Zeus DWMGK 9030

replies.reviewContent: Dear Zohaib, we always aim to deliver a great experience, and we are gutted when we don't meet expectations. Thanks for taking the time to bring this to our attention. We would like to inform you that 14 days return policy is always applicable on all our products but change of mind is not applicable on any of our product. Moreover, if you buy small appliance then you have to visit our service center for warranty claim or checking the issue. As you can hopefully see from our other reviews, your situation is the exception and far from our usual high standards and company values.

items.reviewContent: I ordered DWMGK 9030 Multigroom kit of Rs. 10500 and what they send is DWMC 9030 which is around Rs. 8000. What a pathetic seller.  Despite its a new launched product and also a costly one I ordered and what I get this crap..! I suggest not to buy this crap its better to purchase philips multigroom from offline market. which u can get around 12k. which is best in quality. better than this . Not recommended at all...üëé

items.reviewContent:
Writing this review a few months after my purchase. 

One of the best purchases I‚Äôve made from the Dawlance page. Excellent quality product in an international level selection of attachments. 

After using it for a couple of months, the quality of the charge and maintenance of the machine has not deteriorated. 

Easily rivals the Braun and Philips machines, all the while giving much more options. 

Definitely recommend this version with the attachments! üëçüèª

We‚Äôre very grateful for customers like you and hope you stick with us for years to come! In case you have other feedback for us, please don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us at any time. üòä

items.reviewContent:
It worked for 5 mins and then completely stopped working on the very first day. I was gutted as I was expecting much better quality given the price. This looks like a known defect as I see other people complaining about the same. 

Created hassle as I had to go and submit the item to Daraz warehouse. The purpose of online purchase was defeated (convenience)

However, I am happy with Daraz as they quickly processed my refund request. :)
